Summary: The app helps users shop online by providing reviews of genuine products.

This extension has saved me $ and time, especially on ebay and amazon. I can always find a more reputable seller once I know one is questionable. They are good about updating the ratings if you select that option.
Fakespot is useful and helped avoid bad experiences on Amazon.

Great extension if you shop a lot online. It really makes you a lot more educated about the products you are trying to buy. The ratings are right on the money a lot with my experience with certain products. It can also weed out the fake reviews which really saves you time.
The app has saved the user from bad purchases, has an easy-to-use interface, and provides thorough information.
The products lived up to their evaluation system.
This extension is very helpful for identifying trustworthy sellers online, and the user relies on its ratings.
I would not shop without it. I believe that it has saved me money, time and aggravation.
Generally positive review of Fakespot app; helpful for identifying sellers and comparing products.
Useful tool to avoid scams on Amazon; easy to install and use.
Great extension. I appreciate the input regarding likelihood of fake reviews.
This app helps determine whether to buy something from Amazon by providing buyer information and allowing score rechecks.
Positive review of Fakespot, a product that helps users avoid purchasing fake products.
This app is a wallet saver. The user also mentions that the app calls out fake reviews and that ratings can change over time.
This app is practical and has saved the user aggravation, especially when dealing with potentially unreliable sellers and reviews on Amazon. The user appreciates the protection offered by Fakespot.
